description: This file defines a mock class 'Store2NotificationMock' for unit testing, which implements the 'INotification' interface from 'WPEFramework::Exchange::IStore2'. It includes mock method definitions and interface mapping macros.

classes.name: Store2NotificationMock
classes.description: A mock implementation of the 'INotification' interface for testing purposes, providing a mocked 'ValueChanged' method.

methods.name: ValueChanged
methods.description: Mock method that simulates notification of a value change, with parameters for scope, namespace, key, and value.

calls: MOCK_METHOD(void, ValueChanged, (const WPEFramework::Exchange::IStore2::ScopeType scope, const string& ns, const string& key, const string& value), (override))
